review: This little thing has become our default source for watching TV. While they do try to get you to rent/buy things in the way the search works, it's not hard to work around it. The Netflix app is good, and the Plex app is fantastic. I'd give it five stars if I could filter out any Amazon content that's not included in my Prime subscription.
author: T. Nuckolls

review: This has replaced our basic cable package.  HBO, ESPN, etc. have apps that let us watch for free what we were formerly paying to see.  There are opportunities to purchase apps in device, but you can also get a lot of mileage out of this device without paying for additional services.
author: Heidi Kauffman

review: It was great while it worked but quit after a few months and Amazon's tech support and customer service has been surprisingly difficult to deal with.  All the diagnostics require the unit to power up and display video, mine does not display video and that seems to baffle customer service.  Hopefully they will work it out soon since we are going on 2 months now.
